prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing birthday greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Birthday card for best friend.
His name is Mau and he loves to workout in the gym. And everyone applause for his strong "
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: Mau
From: Meiling
Message: "Happy birthday, Mau! I hope your cake has as many layers as your abs and that your presents are heavier than your dumbbells. Another year stronger... now go have a cheat day, you've earned it!

Yours,
Meiling"

Reference: "Cute cartoon character look "

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details





- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "birthday" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil character illustration. The scene is vibrant and full of life, centered on a charmingly exaggerated, muscular character representing Mau, who is smiling broadly while lifting a giant, comically oversized dumbbell made of birthday cake. The background features a soft, celebratory atmosphere with hand-drawn confetti and streamers that seem to float around him. The style is characterized by its opaque, painterly gouache base, giving the colors a rich, velvety texture, while fine colored pencil details add definition, warmth, and a touch of handcrafted charm to his cheerful expression and the texture of the cake. The overall feeling is joyful, personal, and full of admiration, as if sketched by a friend with a smile.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a birthday card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil character illustration. The scene is vibrant and full of life, centered on a charmingly exaggerated, muscular character representing Mau, who is smiling broadly while lifting a giant, comically oversized dumbbell made of birthday cake. The background features a soft, celebratory atmosphere with hand-drawn confetti and streamers that seem to float around him. The style is characterized by its opaque, painterly gouache base, giving the colors a rich, velvety texture, while fine colored pencil details add definition, warmth, and a touch of handcrafted charm to his cheerful expression and the texture of the cake. The overall feeling is joyful, personal, and full of admiration, as if sketched by a friend with a smile.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Happy birthday, Mau! I hope your cake has as many layers as your abs and that your presents are heavier than your dumbbells. Another year stronger... now go have a cheat day, you've earned it!

Yours,
Meiling" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil character illustration. The scene is vibrant and full of life, centered on a charmingly exaggerated, muscular character representing Mau, who is smiling broadly while lifting a giant, comically oversized dumbbell made of birthday cake. The background features a soft, celebratory atmosphere with hand-drawn confetti and streamers that seem to float around him. The style is characterized by its opaque, painterly gouache base, giving the colors a rich, velvety texture, while fine colored pencil details add definition, warmth, and a touch of handcrafted charm to his cheerful expression and the texture of the cake. The overall feeling is joyful, personal, and full of admiration, as if sketched by a friend with a smile.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil character illustration. The scene is vibrant and full of life, centered on a charmingly exaggerated, muscular character representing Mau, who is smiling broadly while lifting a giant, comically oversized dumbbell made of birthday cake. The background features a soft, celebratory atmosphere with hand-drawn confetti and streamers that seem to float around him. The style is characterized by its opaque, painterly gouache base, giving the colors a rich, velvety texture, while fine colored pencil details add definition, warmth, and a touch of handcrafted charm to his cheerful expression and the texture of the cake. The overall feeling is joyful, personal, and full of admiration, as if sketched by a friend with a smile.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Front cover of a greeting card with a flat 2D cartoon illustration. The art style is reminiscent of modern animation with bold outlines and a limited, warm color palette. The background features a stylized sky with fluffy, light blue clouds and a bright, yellow sun with radiating lines, all set against a light beige backdrop that extends to the edges, creating a full-bleed effect. In the foreground, there are two cartoon characters, a woman and a man, positioned in the center of the card, with their faces and upper bodies visible.

The woman on the left has short, wavy, reddish-brown hair, large round glasses with black frames, and a friendly, slightly smiling expression. She is wearing a chunky, grey knit sweater with a textured, cream-colored pattern resembling a fluffy cloud or sheep's wool, and a dark grey turtleneck underneath. Her lower body is obscured by the frame.

The man on the right has short, dark brown hair, wears black-rimmed glasses, and has a wide, cheerful smile. He is dressed in a dark grey polo shirt, a green bomber jacket, and blue shorts. His posture is relaxed, with one hand slightly in his pocket.

Behind the characters, on the left, is a simplified illustration of an orange building with two dark rectangular windows, suggesting a house or structure. On the right, another simplified orange building is partially visible, with a dark rectangular window. Green bushes or trees are subtly depicted between the buildings and the characters.

The text "SUNNY DAY" is prominently displayed in large, bold, uppercase, sans-serif letters across the top of the card, colored in a vibrant orange. The text is centered and positioned safely away from the top edge. The overall mood is lighthearted, cheerful, and evokes a feeling of a pleasant, everyday scene. The composition is balanced, with the characters as the focal point and the background elements providing context without being distracting. The colors are flat and saturated, contributing to the clean, modern cartoon aesthetic.
generatedPrompts.backCover:
Here are the detailed image generation prompts for each section of the birthday card:

**Front Cover Prompt:**

"Front cover design for a funny and heartwarming birthday card for a best friend. The style is a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil character illustration with a 9:16 aspect ratio. The scene is vibrant and full of life, centered on a charmingly exaggerated, muscular cartoon character representing Mau. He is smiling broadly and holding a giant, comically oversized dumbbell made of a layered birthday cake with six lit candles. The cake has a bite taken out of it, revealing yellow cake inside. The barbell part of the dumbbell is a dark grey, and the weights are also dark grey. The background is a soft, pale blue with a sparse scattering of faint, hand-drawn, light blue outline stars. A few colorful sprinkles are falling from the bite in the cake. The overall feeling is joyful, personal, and full of admiration. Key elements, including the character's face, are kept at least 10% away from the top and bottom edges, and 0.5 inches from the left and right edges. The text 'Happy Birthday!' is integrated into the scene in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script, positioned in the central area."

**Left Interior Prompt:**

"Left interior page design for a funny and heartwarming birthday card for a best friend, maintaining a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil illustration style with a 9:16 aspect ratio. This section focuses on visual storytelling development. The scene depicts an empty, stylized gym rack, subtly colored in a darker grey than the barbell on the front cover, and positioned slightly off-center to the left. Above the rack, floating in the pale blue background, are several of the same faint, hand-drawn, light blue outline stars seen on the front cover, but with a few extra scattered. The overall tone is lighthearted and humorous, setting a visual continuation of the birthday celebration without direct character presence, creating artistic breathing room before the main message. Key elements are kept at least 10% away from the top and bottom edges, and 0.5 inches from the left and right edges. The color palette is consistent with the front cover: pale blue background, muted color accents. There is no text on this page."

**Right Interior Prompt:**

"Right interior page design for a funny and heartwarming birthday card for a best friend, with a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil illustration style and a 9:16 aspect ratio. This is the story's climax, beautifully integrating the message. The background is a soft, pale blue, continuing the theme with a few more faint, hand-drawn, light blue outline stars scattered across the upper portion. The central visual element is the message: 'Happy birthday, Mau! I hope your cake has as many layers as your abs and that your presents are heavier than your dumbbells. Another year stronger... now go have a cheat day, you've earned it!

Yours,
Meiling' written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that looks like elegant, warm penmanship with slight variations in line weight. The handwriting is strategically placed and artfully framed by subtle, abstract shapes in soft, desaturated pink and yellow hues that mimic the frosting and cake layers from the front cover, creating an artistic, non-clichÃ© border without featuring any people or direct objects. These abstract shapes are blended into the background colors. The overall feeling is joyful, personal, and celebratory. All text and key decorative elements are kept at least 10% away from the top and bottom edges, and 0.5 inches from the left and right edges."

**Back Cover Prompt:**

"Back cover design for a funny and heartwarming birthday card for a best friend, continuing the warm and playful gouache and colored pencil illustration style with a 9:16 aspect ratio. This is the story's resolution, offering a subtle and artistic conclusion. The background is a soft, pale blue. The design is minimalist and serene, featuring a few scattered faint, hand-drawn, light blue outline stars across the upper and central areas, mirroring the motifs from the front and interior pages. In the central and left-leaning portion of the cover, there are small, abstract splashes of the cake's frosting colors (muted pink and yellow) and a few of the falling colorful sprinkles from the front cover, artfully arranged. The bottom-right corner, approximately a 1-inch square area, is left completely clear and undecorated for a QR code. The overall effect is a quiet, artistic wrap-up that complements the card's theme without being overly busy, creating a sense of peaceful closure. No text or characters are present on this page."
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a humorous and lighthearted tone, in a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil character illustration style. The scene depicts a stylized wooden shelf unit against a light blue background sprinkled with small yellow confetti. The shelves are filled with playful, trophy-like objects representing fitness achievements combined with treats. The top shelf features a golden dumbbell, stylized with bold outlines and a glossy finish, presented on a golden plaque with the text "GOLDEN DUMBBELL". The middle shelf displays a cupcake with a swirl of creamy frosting, sitting on a golden plaque labeled "KETTLEBELL CUPCAKE", next to a brown kettlebell on a similar golden plaque with red ribbons hanging from it. The bottom shelf shows a golden plaque with the text "PROTEIN SHAKE MEDAL", from which hangs a medal designed to look like a chocolate chip cookie. The overall artistic style is flat 2D, with opaque gouache for rich color and textured areas, and fine colored pencil details for definition and a handcrafted feel. The composition is centered and balanced, with a clear visual narrative of humorous fitness-related "awards."
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a birthday greeting card designed for message space with a decorative border of stylized fruits and protein bars. The background is a soft, light blue. The central area is an off-white oval, creating a clean canvas for the message. The handwritten text is in a flowing, dark blue cursive script, featuring the message "Happy birthday, Mau! I hope your cake has as many layers as your abs and that your presents are heavier than your dumbbells. Another year stronger... now go have a cheat day, you've earned it! Yours, Meiling". The decorative border elements include bright strawberries, blueberries, lemon slices, orange slices, green apples, and cartoonish protein bars, all framed by green leaves. A prominent gold medal with a smiling face hangs at the top center of the border. The artistic style is a warm and playful gouache and colored pencil illustration, characterized by opaque, painterly gouache with fine colored pencil details adding definition and warmth. The overall design is vibrant, joyful, and personal, with a humorous and lighthearted tone.
